title: Jelle Bosma
content:
Netherlands based type designer for [Monotype Imaging Inc.](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809050322/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Monotype%20Imaging%20Inc.)

Born 1959 in Rijswijk, the Netherlands  
Bosma studied at the Royal Academy of Art in The Hague under Gerrit Noordzij

Bosma's type designs include: Forlane and Cambria

[Bosma's type designs and bio at MTI's website](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809050322/http:/www.monotypeimaging.com/ProductsServices/TypeDesignerShowcase/JelleBosma/)
author: delve
